title: KHR_materials_volume_scatter glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the scattering parameters for the volume of a material.

multiscatterColor.gltf_detailedDescription: The perceived color of the volume medium due to scattering (not absorption) after many scattering events.

scatterAnisotropy.gltf_detailedDescription: The anisotropy of scatter events. Range is (-1, 1). 1 indicates forward scattering, -1 indicates backscattering. The default is zero and indicates isotropic scattering.
